column3: Torn between curiosity and scorn, Maucolyn would report an odd sighting.

Maucolyn has recently observed a local trader capering in the cold, tossing snowballs in what the dour chocobokeep assumes to be a fit of hypothermic hysteria. Speak with this trader, Duvicauroix, and inquire as to his well-being.

Happily, there proves to be a method to Duvicauroix's madness. The trader asserts that playing in the snow can warm the body and heart on a cold winter's day more so than even a fire, and teaches you how to /throw a snowball as the first step toward mastering this invigorating form of play...
I can't see as how I oughta care, but I saw a fella out throwin' snowballs at a snowman. Why anyone'd engage in such japery in the cold, I can't rightly say.

Went nut gatherin' and lost more'n he found, is my guess. Ye better make sure that don't happen to \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03you\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03, \x02\x08\x0e\xe9\x05\xff\x05lass\xff\x04lad\x03. Not that I know precisely \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03what\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03 happened, mind ye.
What's that? Me? \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03Ask\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03? I got my chocobos to see to. If Duvicauroix wants to upend his head soup on the snow, I can't see what business o' mine it'd be.
Yep, that's his name\xe2\x94\x80Duvicauroix. I don't know, he sells things, goes places. Don't seem like no kind o' life to me, beggin' pardon. Ye want to see him, I reckon he's somewhere about.
Walking softly, eh, adventurer? Those around here think I'm winter\x02\x1f\x01\x03drunk, I'll wager. Hah! Never seen a snow\x02\x1f\x01\x03toss before, the lazy by\x02\x1f\x01\x03blows.

Sit on your arse in front of a poor fire too long, and soon you got the swivin' white\x02\x1f\x01\x03knuckles. You'll sleep the better for tossing snowballs, without needing Lady Mead or Mistress Ale to sing the lullaby.
What do you say, eh? Why not give it a try? It's as simple as you'd imagine. Just reach on down, grab some of the powdery white, and \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03throw\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03!
